title: DuongZ115
author: DuongZ115
content: Here, in this thread share how you make money from crypto every dayI first, I'm a hunter and manager , what I do every day is manage a community that helps with projects and I make 100$/week

comments.author: tech30338
comments.body: Quote from: DuongZ115 on December 06, 2022, 04:46:00 AMHere, in this thread share how you make money from crypto every dayI first, I'm a hunter and manager , what I do every day is manage a community that helps with projects and I make 100$/weekI make money on trading, airdrop hunting, and play to earn games like axies, there lots of ways, also you can join signature campaigns of you are eligible of course

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Apart from trading or mining, there are several other ways you can make money from Crypto. Like hunting for airdrops, playing online games with crypto payments and joining signature campaigns for Bitcoin payments or starting blockchain projects. Currently I can make money from trading and signature campaigns, although the results are not as much as imagined, I really enjoy the income I get from Crypto.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: It is unlikely that you will receive a hundred dollars from a bounty company. I see your commitment to this activity.But I know that on freelance sites today, many different offers are paid in bitcoin. If you have the skills of a translator or know how to write articles correctly, you can offer yourself there. In the same way, some sites offer to test games that, after the test, are also paid in bitcoin. But here, you need to undergo training to competently look for errors. Therefore, in our time, finding additional income is not a problem; the problem is the lack of skills people have.

comments.author: bitmover
comments.body: Quote from: DuongZ115 on December 06, 2022, 04:46:00 AMHere, in this thread share how you make money from crypto every dayI first, I'm a hunter and manager , what I do every day is manage a community that helps with projects and I make 100$/weekBitcoin was not created so to others make money. Bitcoin was created to protect your money.Until you understand that, you probably won't be making $ 100 a week here.Understand the fundamentals, grow your technical knowledge, and then you can build a reputation here to join campaigns and stuff

comments.author: PrivacyG
comments.body: Try to work on earning extra income and put all of that in Bitcoin. Â You will start stacking transactions up in no time.There are other ways like working up your account to higher ranks and joining Signature Campaigns. Â But you have to work many months on it before you start earning decent money and if you do not have a pleasure spending your time on Bitcoin Talk, forget about it and go back to the first tip I gave you. Â Do not grow your account here JUST to earn from Signature Campaigns.-Regards,PrivacyG

comments.author: ThemePen
comments.body: If you are thinking to earn free money. So I think this is not easy.Yes the airdrops give much money sometimes. But it is not frequently or not a passive income. If you want to earn passive income you should learn about trading first and than you should introduce it to your community. And there is one more option that is staking. Staking does not give big money but this can help or a passive income source. And by this method you can hold coins or tokens too. But in the selection of coin/token choose wisely.

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on December 06, 2022, 11:59:16 AMAnd by this method you can hold coins or tokens too. Hodling of coins is not profitable when it is not bull time , it can only serve like keeping your coins there for the main time but the best of all is to trade the coins if you can but it is not easy. Airdrops, bounty hunting are all bounch of time wasting exercise that will not yield enough for you to take care of yourself. Having skill or knowledge for online freelancing, graphic design and drawing can surely help. Now many are into content creation through Snapchat etc.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: PrivacyG on December 06, 2022, 11:52:34 AMTry to work on earning extra income and put all of that in Bitcoin. Â You will start stacking transactions up in no time.There are other ways like working up your account to higher ranks and joining Signature Campaigns. Â But you have to work many months on it before you start earning decent money and if you do not have a pleasure spending your time on Bitcoin Talk, forget about it and go back to the first tip I gave you. Â Do not grow your account here JUST to earn from Signature Campaigns.I think the title of the topic is a bit tricky. OP obviously already has a way of making money and is happy with it. here he just wants to hear how others earn bitcoin. considering that he introduces himself as a "hunter-manager", I believe he knows everything about ranking on the forum and the potential opportunities from it.I don't think that someone who makes good money in a specific way will just share details about it. why would he attract additional competition?as in some previous similar topics, most of the comments will end with the same answers. it all comes down to bounty hunting and airdrop.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: palle11 on December 06, 2022, 12:21:17 PMHodling of coins is not profitable when it is not bull timeIf you actually want to benefit during the bull market, you should invest during the bear market. That's when you can buy coins at a premium.With this, you can technical say that one can profit outside the bull market cause that's when you build your portfolio.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: For a start with no reputation, Iâ€™ve used to join airdrops and bounty hunting. Until now it exists but the rewards arenâ€™t high as before and has uncertainty. You could get lucky if at least one of them would give you bigger rewards. Trading is a common way to make money, but you need some capital to start but there will be no guarantees or promises that youâ€™ll get profit daily because of the market uncertainties.Joining testnet tasks is also another way, but most of them arenâ€™t worth it and itâ€™s time consuming. Only a handful of testnets are successful and gives higher payouts.You can also become an ambassador by joining multiple ambassador opportunities. There are some play to earn games who are actually looking for beta testers and ambassadors too.For long term, I suggest you start building your own crypto community whether if itâ€™s Telegram, Discord, etc. Once you have gained big numbers organically, you can start entertain paid services like pinned post, AMAs, etc. Also for long term, be a crypto content creator either Youtube, Tiktok, articles, etc.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: The world of crypto isn't so much different from real life jobs that people can do, the major difference is usually the mode of payment that's all... although most gigs around the crypto verse are centered around digital jobs.Btw the best gigs that can pay you well require some certain level of skill for you to be paid but you can start with any of the following : trading, web development, art, bug bounty hunting, service testing the list is endless, it's all about finding where you can be paid regularly.

comments.author: Ryker1
comments.body: Quote from: DuongZ115 on December 06, 2022, 04:46:00 AMHere, in this thread share how you make money from crypto every dayI first, I'm a hunter and manager , what I do every day is manage a community that helps with projects and I make 100$/weekWell that is good for you and I hope you did not help those scammers in crypto promoting an obvious new scam crypto project. If you are satisfied with the $100 per week that is good but you can increase your earnings through the suggestion above. However, you can increase it by looking at other options like investing your earnings into bitcoin or trading when your salary arrives. Freelancers are thee most common at this day, if you have skills then, earning in crypto is not that hard for you.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: DuongZ115 on December 06, 2022, 04:46:00 AMHere, in this thread share how you make money from crypto every dayI first, I'm a hunter and manager , what I do every day is manage a community that helps with projects and I make 100$/weekOP you're complicating two things here, if you're interested in advertising yourself then i think there's a board specifically assigned for that function which is services, but if what you are referring to here is to inform us that you're a bounty hunter then good for you because there are good and the bad ones with high risk, most are a waste of time ir a chase of air, also i don't think much people will come out here to recommend bounties when we all key into bitcoin the most reliable digital currency, if i may provide you my answer it's bitcoin and it's very simple, just invest and hodl or learn how to trade.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: There are different ways to make money in crypto. What you will need is time to find those legit projects that will pay in Crypto like Bitcoin. Second, you must have the skills needed for the job to do it because if you don't have the skills required then you are most likely not getting that job. The easiest one is to join bounty campaigns and get paid later. The problem with bounty campaigns are most of it are scams and you can hardly find a legit one to actually get paid.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: ThemePen on December 06, 2022, 11:59:16 AMIf you are thinking to earn free money. So I think this is not easy.Yes the airdrops give much money sometimes. But it is not frequently or not a passive income. If you want to earn passive income you should learn about trading first and than you should introduce it to your community.That was in the past when airdrops made so many people good money, not anymore now. In fact, this day be sure to get malware from links you will click while hunting airdrops. I don't encourage anyone to indulge it. Talking about trading, how do you earn passively on it when we all know that trading is an active engagement?QuoteAnd there is one more option that is staking. Staking does not give big money but this can help or a passive income source. And by this method you can hold coins or tokens too. But in the selection of coin/token choose wisely. I hope you also know that you can lose your staked tokens and coins too if the site decides to go rogue ðŸ¤”

comments.author: isaac_clarke22
comments.body: Quote from: DuongZ115 on December 06, 2022, 04:46:00 AM~Well I do freelancing and get paid through crypto through some platforms like LaborX if that was was you meant by this thread since crypto is not really a "moneymaker" although people see it also as an investment. I have an Upwork account as Â well, but we all know that they just allow USD payments and not crypto, unless they do support it in the future which is I doubt will happen just how long it was suggested before in their community page. We kinda have the similar experience though I usually just engage with the community rather than manage it

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: The interesting thing here is @OP never make post after 2 years and now comeback like he's success in this forum by milking $100/week.This mean it's a high chance if @OP has many alt accounts where he's a manager and the participants are his alt accounts, so he's become a manager and then he's become a participants too, he can do anything to able earn so much shitcoins. Since bounties right now aren't worth it anymore, so he may use more than 5 accounts to earn $100/week.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: There are many ways to earn money from Crypto like Joining Bounties and Airdrops, Trading, Joining AMA and many more. I mostly do trades and make decent profits everyday. And I like to join Signature campaign in this Forum.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: I don't know what the OP means in the title how to make money in crypto while in the post on as a community manager and earn $100/week?Then you just get out of bed and ask about this a little strange what I understand and the most important thing is to learn to keep improving your skills because not everything you imagine making money from crypto requires a long journey.Crypto should not be used as a benchmark for income if you already understand blockchain technology then you can offer yourself as what the company needs, but in essence you have to understand what you have from this knowledge.
